history.proof: assert (H: p = S (p - 1)). rewrite Nat.sub_1_r. symmetry. qsimpl. rewrite H. clear H. rewrite nat2Zp_minus. assert (H: S (p - 1) = p). qsimpl. rewrite H. clear H. rewrite <- nat2Zp_one. - hauto lq: on use: nat2Zp_zero, Zp_plus_zero, Zp_opp_zero, Zp_opp_plus, nat2Zp_one, nat2Zp_p. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 Unable to unify "?M1463 - ?M1464 = ?M1465" with "S (Nat.pred p) = p".
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 H : p = S (p - 1) Unable to unify "∸ Op" with "〚 p - 1 〛".
The reference Nat2Zp_minus was not found in the current environment.
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 Unable to unify "?M1501 - ?M1502 = ?M1503" with "S (p - 1) = p".
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 H : S (p - 1) = p Unable to unify "∸ Op" with "〚 S (p - 1) 〛 ⊕ ∸ 〚 1 〛".
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 Unable to unify "∸ 〚 1 〛" with "〚 p 〛 ⊕ ∸ 〚 1 〛".

original: assert (H: p = S (p - 1)). { rewrite Nat.sub_1_r. symmetry. apply Nat.add_sub_eq_l. reflexivity. } rewrite H. clear H. rewrite Nat2Zp_minus. assert (H: S (p - 1) = p). { apply Nat.add_sub_eq_l. reflexivity. } rewrite H. clear H. rewrite <- nat2Zp_one. reflexivity.
